attributes.action: LONGER/HARSHER PRISON SENTENCES FOR SEX OFFENDERS, CHILD SEX OFFENDERS, RAPISTS
attributes.additional_details: doing it, there is nothing more important than our children’s and our own safety.
attributes.background: in my opinion and many others, sex offenders, child sex offenders, rapists and anyone from that type of background usually get let off too lenient. so i think it’s important for the government to take this into consideration. it takes a couple of minutes to sign this petition so please think about

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Increase minimum and maximum sentences for all sexual offences
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577443

Mandatory life sentence for child sexual abuse
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562527
